issue.title: Visual gaps to outside in tunnel_circuit_practice.ign

content.raw:
The gaps on the walls are fixed. I think the seams on between tiles on the ground should be gone too. Let me know if you still see them.

I’ve uploaded all the updated tunnel tile models onto fuel. Clear the cache and it should download the latest version of the tiles, e.g.

```
rm -fr ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/*Tunnel*
```
content.html:
The gaps on the walls are fixed. I think the seams on between tiles on the ground should be gone too. Let me know if you still see them.

I’ve uploaded all the updated tunnel tile models onto fuel. Clear the cache and it should download the latest version of the tiles, e.g.

rm -fr ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/*Tunnel*
